alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; San Juan River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 11 at 6:59PM MDT until October 13 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Lower Yampa River Basin, Central Colorado River Basin and San Juan River Basin. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; San Juan River Basin
